name: Trials of Wilderness
description:
You are alone on an island, trying desperately to survive amongst the village tribes of savages.
To do this you need food, water, and shelter. Hunt animals to gather meat, chop down trees to build a base.
However take a few moments to enjoy the beauty of the wilderness and plant crops, breed animals and explore, but don't be to relaxed.
The savages hunt in packs.
